articles.description: Tirien Steinbach, Stanford Law School’s associate dean for diversity, equity and inclusion, resigned Thursday, months after her confrontation with Trump-appointed Judge Stuart Kyle Duncan went viral.

A Stanford University dean who confronted a Trump-appointed judge after he was heckled by students during a speaking event has finally resigned months after being suspended for the incident.
